nodes.text: Zirtan's Anchor was a shadowport located in the Phosphura Belt in the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. The former pirate Queen Maz Kanata marked it on a map she included in the book that would eventually become known as the Smuggler's Guide.

Zirtran's Anchor was first mentioned in the current canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace. It first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 1995 article "Zirtran's Anchor", which was written by Tony Russo and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 5.
